title_eng: China To Siberia: Crossing The Loneliest Lake
director_info_chn: 郭容非，纪录片导演，制片人，毕业于纽约大学新闻与纪录片专业。她的处女作《我是仙女》曾获得2016年学生奥斯卡奖。\n徐江军是一位青年探险家，他曾单人单车穿越3大洲18国，徒步穿越外高加索，2017年中国户外金犀牛奖年度最佳背包客奖得主。
director_info_eng: Guo Rongfei, documentary director and producer, graduated from New York University majoring in Documentary. Her debut, Fairy Tales, wins the silver medal of  2016 Student Academy Award.（换行）Xu Jiangjun is a Chinese adventurer and Ultimate Frisbee athlete. He spent two years cycling the world-a journey of 14,000 kilometers across 16 countries and 3 continents. More recently, Xu has walked across Transcaucasia, He has won dozens of tournaments domestically and internationally.
production: 界面（上海）网络科技有限公司
info_chn: 中国 | 2017 | 32分钟 | 中文 | 探险
description_chn: 贝加尔湖是世界上容量最大的淡水湖。迄今，世界上只有七个人在冬季南北穿越贝加尔湖，徐江军是第七位，也是唯一的中国人。在整整23天的无人区穿越中，他把相机当作自己旅程中最亲近的朋友，纪录下穿越过程中欣喜、绝望与苦中作乐的美妙瞬间。
description_eng: Lake Baikal is the largest and deepest freshwater lake in the world. So far only seven people in the world have crossed Baikal north to south during winter. Xu Jiangjun is the seventh one and is the only Chinese. During his 23 days’ journey in the Siberian wilderness, Xu Jiangjun’s camera became his closest friend as he recorded the ups and downs of the hardships in front of him. From feelings of excitement to desperation, traversing Baikal would be Xu Jiang Jun’s greatest achievement to date.
award: 评委会特别推荐纪录片

director_info_chn: 美国作家和电视制片人，在中国生活了30多年。他是一名记者，专业的自然历史电视节目的制作人，中国媒体行业的顾问。Farkas为探索频道、国家地理、PBS、ARTE、BBC、NHK、ZDF制作过屡获殊荣的优秀影片。
director_info_eng: Mitchell Farkas, American writer and television producer who has lived in China for more than 30 years. He is a journalist, a professional producer of natural history television programs, and a consultant in the Chinese media industry. Farkas has produced and directed award-winning films for Discovery Channel, National Geographic, PBS, ARTE, BBC, NHK and ZDF.
info_chn: 中国 | 2018 | 60分钟*3集 | 中文/英文 | 自然人文
description_chn: 布里塔尼·布兰德博士与中国最顶尖的博物学家之一进行了一次前所未有的冒险。两位中外探险家亲身实地探索中国极境，揭示中国独特的自然极境是如何从地球本身的内部锻造出来的，并深入到极地人民的生活中，发掘他们与自然的相处之道。
description_eng: In this Discovery Channel special US Geologist, Dr. Brittany Brand pairs up with one of China's top Naturalist on an adventure like no other. The pair are on a mission to reveal how China's unique natural frontiers were forged from the belly of the planet and how the local people connect with such environment.

director_info_chn: 迪恩·约翰逊在英国广播公司、探索频道、HBO、国家地理、历史频道有超过23年的电视工作经验，他的作品涉及领域包括时事，自然历史以及真人秀节目，并获得过美国的“皮博迪奖”和“美国影视金鹰奖”。
director_info_eng: Dean has over 23 years experience in television with the BBC, Discovery Channel, HBO, National Geographic, History channel. Working across the world from Afghanistan to Antarctica, from current affairs, to natural history and reality programs.He has been awarded a ‘Peabody’ award and a Cine Eagle from the US.
production: 五洲传播中心 / 国家地理
info_chn: 中国/美国 | 2018 | 44分钟*3集 | 中文/英文  | 自然人文
description_chn: 国家地理探险家兼摄影师本·霍顿与三位中国新时代探险家组成团队，踏上一段惊险刺激的极限旅程。他们分别前往四川省的四姑娘山，陕西省汉中宁强的天坑群以及祖国南端的海南岛，走近那些在艰苦的环境中与大自然和谐共处的人类群落，向他们学习当地独有的生存技能，学以致用完成挑战。
description_eng: National Geographic explorer and photographer Ben Horton teams up with three Chinese new-era explorers on extreme adventures.They respectively go to Mt.Siguniang in Sichuan Province, sinkholes in Hanzhong, Shaanxi Province and Hainan Island in the southern part of China, to challenge the unique local natural environment, and approach communities that are not just thriving in extreme environments, but living at one with nature.  To complete the challenges, they learn from the locals about their unique survival skills.

director_info_chn: 苏拉王平，川藏队创办者，常年从事高山向导队长工作，有着十余年高山摄影经验，也是此次玛纳斯鲁攀登的带队队长和高山摄影之一。\n吴曦，攀山影视编导，毕业于四川师范大学电影电视学院，从事编导工作数十年。
director_info_eng: Su Lawangping, founder of the Sichuan-Tibet expedition team, has been working as a leader of the alpine guide for many years and has more than ten years of experience in alpine photography. He is also the leader of the Manaslu climbing team and one of the alpine photographers.（换行）Wu Xi, film and television director of mountain climbing. Graduated from the Sichuan Film and Television College, engaged in writing and directing work for many years.
production: 川藏登山运动服务有限责任公司
info_chn: 中国 | 2018 | 88分钟 | 中文 | 攀登
description_chn: 为什么登山？也许能从这部片子里找到答案，川藏队队长苏拉王平带领全国各地的6名普通人，向8000米的“死亡地带”发起冲击，经历体能、毅力的终极考验，最终实现登顶雪山的梦想。
description_eng: Why people go to climb mountains? Maybe you can find the answer from this film. Sula, the captain of Sichuan-Tibet Team, led six ordinary people from all over the country to the "Dead Zone" of 8000 meters, After the ultimate test of physical strength and perseverance, the dream come true on the Mountain.

director_info_eng: Pan Deng, an independent documentary films director and producer.
info_chn: 中国 | 2019 | 120分钟 | 中文 | 攀登
description_chn: 跟随一支民间登山队，记录了他们攀登珠峰的全过程——不仅仅是体力与毅力的付出，更有不同的文化与欲望之间的碰撞、博弈、矛盾。通过该片我们不仅可以了解中国民间登山爱好者登珠峰的原因，更可以观察到中国中产阶级对精神世界的追求，以及中国文化与世界的交融。
description_eng: A few months before and after a folk climbing team, the whole process of climbing Everest was recorded—not only the effort of physical strength and perseverance, but also the collision, game, and contradiction between different cultures and desires. By this documentary, we can not only understand the Chinese folk mountaineering enthusiasts why to reach Mount Everest, but also to observe the Chinese middle class’s pursuit of the spiritual world and the blending of Chinese culture and the world.

director_info_chn: 福斯特·伍德沃德是一位屡获殊荣的摄影师和电影制作人。他的摄影作品已发表在《国家地理》等国际知名杂志。其代表作品《心之重镇》曾在德国柏林电影节等国际电影节展映，获加拿大班夫国际山地电影节最佳短片奖。
director_info_eng: Forest Woodward is an internationally published and awarded photographer. His photographs have been widely published, with notable appearances in National Geographic. His films "The Important Places" have screened in dozens of festivals including Berlinale, receiving awards including Best Short Film from Banff Mountain Film Festival .
info_chn: 美国 | 2019 | 23分钟 | 英语  | 皮划艇
description_chn: 水对于很多人来说，可能只是一种维持生存的要素，或是炎炎夏日里带来清凉的工具。而对于美国划艇队员罗伯·普雷切特来说，是他热情燃烧的生命之源，他是一个百分百的“弄潮儿”——《舟行者们》记录的正是他与水行舟的故事。透过他的相机，我们能感受他对水，对舟，对生命的虔诚信仰。
description_eng: For many people, water may just be a survival material, or a cool tool on a hot summer day. But for Rob Prechtl, an American rower, water is the source of his burning life. He is a "people of water"-this documentary record the story of him and the canoe.  Through his camera, we can feel his pious faith in water, canoe and life.

director_info_chn: Josh是一位屡获殊荣的导演和制片人，作品包括商业广告，品牌制作，电视，短片和故事片及纪录片。代表作（HERE ALONE）获得第16届纽约翠贝卡电影节最佳人气奖。
director_info_eng: Josh is an award-winning director and producer. He is professional with commercial advertisements, brand production, television, films and documentaries production. His representative work (Here Alone won 16th Tribeca Film Festival Audience Award.
info_chn: 美国 | 2019 | 80分钟 | 英语  | 自然环保
description_chn: 《真假鲑鱼》是一部关于河流和野生鱼类的影片，探讨了高成本的工程解决方案对生态，金融和文化的破坏。这部电影详细描述了美国和挪威的孵化场和开放水域养鱼场对公共财政资金的浪费，对野生鱼类的恢复的阻碍，对河流的污染等问题。
description_eng: （Artifishal） is a film about wild rivers and wild fish that explores the high cost—ecological, financial and cultural—of our mistaken belief that engineered solutions can make up for habitat destruction. The film traces the impact of hatcheries and open-water fish farms, and the extraordinary amount of public money wasted on an industry that hinders wild fish recovery, pollutes our rivers and contributes to the problem it claims to solve.

director_info_chn: 马克斯·洛出生于探险之家，从小受到户外冒险启蒙教育。他与国家地理等知名机构合作，其影片屡屡斩获国际大奖。他的摄影作品和影片专注于有意义、有影响力的故事，并致力于深入挖掘世界各地的文化。
director_info_eng: Max Lowe comes from a long lineage of explorers and outdoorsmen. He has since become known for his work with National Geographic and his award-winning adventure films. His photographs and films focus on meaningful stories and dive deep into sub-cultures around the world.
info_chn: 美国 | 2019 | 19分钟 | 英语  | 自然环保
description_chn: 《荒凉仅存》带领我们见证了在全球变暖、北极浮冰逐渐融化的恶劣环境下北极熊的生存危机。许多生物学家坚守在保护物种、对抗全球变暖的前线，他们希望今天的努力，能够保全北极熊们和地球的光明未来。
description_eng: （Bare Existence） gives a behind the scenes look into the plight of the polar bear and the biologists on the front lines of protecting these species as they battle against the effects of climate change threatening their existence. This film presents a drastic cry for immediate attention and instills our viewer with hope, illuminating present-day efforts for a brighter future.

director_info_chn: 莫希特·夏尔马热衷于运动，他拥有多年的户外影像导演经验，影视作品涉及MTB自行车，越野跑，攀冰等运动。
director_info_eng: Mohit is calisthenics practitioner, working-out is a life saving drug for him. Stepping early into the realm of directing films, he has extensively covered sports ranging from MTB cycling, ultrarunning, ice climbing and more.
info_chn: 印度 | 2018 | 13分钟 | 英语/印地语  | 自行车
description_chn: 一群身体残疾、重病的自行车手一同挑战世界上海拔最高的山地自行车道，他们的目标只有一个——证明自己能够跨越生理和心理上的障碍。这17位勇者成功跨越五个山口，克服了来自极端天气、缺氧以及上天给他们的身体的各种限制。
description_eng: A group of disabled cyclists peddled together to the highest all-weather motorable road in the world Khardung La with one mission — to cycle in order to push their physical and mental barriers. These cyclists braving five mountain passes, extreme weather conditions, low oxygen conditions, and most of all, the limitations the world had put on them.

director_info_chn: 几年来，沙姆斯一直带着他的相机走遍世界各地，纪录运动员们的冒险之旅。同时，他也是徒步旅行者、越野跑者、山地运动员和滑翔伞玩家，他总能够以不同的视角去发现这些运动和冒险经历的闪光点。
director_info_eng: Since few years, Shams carried his camera all over the world to follow the athletes in their adventures. He is also hiker, trail runner, climber, mountaineer and paragliding pilot that he manages to have a different eye on the action in front of him.
info_chn: 法国 | 2018 | 28分钟 | 英语 | 翼装飞行
description_chn: 约克·索莫是一位热衷于挑战的世界级翼装飞行运动员。一直以来，约克梦想着在瑞士著名的三座山峰上完成翼装飞行挑战。在这个不可思议的旅程中，我们会了解这位传奇运动员的生活方式，他的疑虑、担忧和成就，以及去发现他飞越山峰的真正意义。
description_eng: Jokke Sommer, a world class professional wingsuit athlete, likes to push himself and to find new challenges. For a long time Jokke has dreamed of speed riding the famous 3 peaks of Switzerland. Following this incredible journey, we can discover the lifestyle, the doubts, the risks, and rewards of this incredible athletes. And most importantly, to discover what it is beyond the peaks.

director_chn: 乔伊·舒斯勒/本·佩奇/托马斯·伍德森
director_info_chn: 乔伊·舒斯勒是一名擅长山地自行车和滑雪的冒险运动员。他将自己的运动技能与他作为摄影师和电影制片人的创造性有机结合，制作了许多优秀的极限运动影片。\n本·佩奇是一位屡获殊荣的英国电影制作人、户外探险家和摄影师。他的作品入围众多国际电影节并斩获多项大奖，例如加拿大班夫山地电影节评委特别推荐、纽约电影节最佳探险影片等。\n托马斯·伍德森是一名商业摄影师和电影制片人，热衷于人力冒险。他擅长滑雪、攀登和自行车旅行。
director_info_eng: Joey Schusler is a professional adventure athlete,photographer, and award winning filmmaker. Named one of Outside Magazines “30 under 30” of young people making big strides in the outdoor industry.（换行）Ben Page is a multi-award winning filmmaker, adventurer and photographer based in the UK. His highly acclaimed films have appeared in more than 30 international film festivals winning numerous awards such as Banff and New York Film Festival.（换行）Thomas Woodson is a commercial photographer and filmmaker passionate about human powered adventures. He is proficient in ski touring, climbing and bikepacking enable self-sufficient backcountry productions.
info_chn: 美国 | 2019 | 11分钟 | 英语 | 滑雪
description_chn: 表面上这是一群探险家去寻找并挑战人生之中最长的滑雪线路，但实际上，这只是一场兄弟之间的亲密聚会。他们回归自然，抛弃一切通讯设备，把有限的时间投入到最有意义的陪伴之中。这是一场盛大的单身派对，也是这群兄弟们各自人生的狂欢。
description_eng: On paper they’d come in search of the biggest ski lines of our lives. But the reality was that they simply had come to celebrate friendship. To withdraw into the wild, to remove distractions and cell service and emails, and to invest purposeful time into being together. It’s a great party of those bachelor as well as their lives.

director_info_chn: 马特·哈迪，自由户外摄影师，电影制作人。
director_info_eng: Matt Hardy, freelance outdoor camera man and video editor.
info_chn: 英国 | 2019 | 17分钟 | 英语 | 越野跑
description_chn: 总有人说越野跑者很古怪，很疯狂，他们总往最险峻的地方跑。“Dark Peak Fell Runners” 正是这些怪诞之人的聚集处，这是英国最大的越野跑俱乐部之一。他们在田野，在泥潭沼泽，在碎石路上打造了属于自己的跑步乐园。这部纪录片将跟随着他们的脚步，欣赏那些人迹罕至的地方令人惊喜的沿途风景，感受他们奔跑的自由快乐。
description_eng: Fell runners seems to be weird and crazy because they like to run on dangerous hills. Dark Peak Fell Runners is one of the largest pure running clubs in the UK, also the base for such crazy runners. They build their own running parks in the fields, in the mud swamps, and on the gravel roads. The film follows in their footsteps to enjoy the amazing scenery along the way in inaccessible places, and feel the freedom and joy of their running.

director_info_chn: 沃杰克·科扎基维奇是一位体育类影视制作者。其作品曾获加拿大班夫山地电影节、毕尔巴鄂山地电影节、加德满都山地电影节等。
director_info_eng: Wojtek Kozakiewicz is a filmmaker mostly focused on sport stories. His films have been awarded at major mountain film festivals including Banff, Bilbao, Kathmandu.
info_chn: 波兰 | 2017 | 45分钟 | 波兰语 | 攀岩
description_chn: 拥有家庭之后，妈妈们似乎不得不放弃部分的自我，成全家庭的美满。攀岩运动员金卡·奥西普卡·格里泽古尔斯卡成为两位萌娃的母亲之后，也陷入了家庭和事业之间的矛盾。她会如何平衡两者的关系？
description_eng: After starting a family, mothers seem to have to give up part of themselves to take good care of family. Rock climber Kinga Ociepka-Grzegulska has become the mother of two cute children, but also fell into a conflict between family and career. How would she choose and balance?

director_chn: 达西·维滕堡/达伦·麦卡洛/科林·琼斯
director_info_chn: 达西·维滕堡，导演，制片人，电影摄影师，Anthill Films联合创始人。\n达伦·麦卡洛，导演，剪辑师，电影摄影师，Anthill Films联合创始人。\n科林·琼斯，导演，电影摄影师，剪辑师，无人机飞行师，Anthill Films联合创始人。
director_info_eng: Darcy Wittenburg, director, producer, cinematographer, partner of Anthill Films（换行）Darren McCullough, director, cinematographer,  lead editor, partner of Anthill Films（换行）Colin Jones, director, cinematographer, editor, drone operator, partner of Anthill Films（换行）
info_chn: 加拿大/美国/阿根廷/瑞士 | 2019 | 47分钟 | 英语 | 山地自行车
description_chn: 这是一次完全沉浸式的山地自行车的快感体验。镜头引领你飞越郁郁葱葱的海岸丛林，迷失在巴塔哥尼亚原始山脉中，感受犹他州超凡脱俗的美景。
description_eng: It’s a cinematic journey , through true to life examples set by some of the sport’s biggest athletes, unsung shredders and up-and-coming youth, to lead you to fly through the lush coastal jungles of Oahu, feel the dust from Utah’s otherworldly landscapes, lose yourself in the untouched mountains of Patagonia. \nA fantastic experience that will immediately transport you into that feeling of total immersion you get on a bike ride.

director_info_chn: 乔伊·舒斯勒是一名擅长山地自行车和滑雪的冒险运动员，同时也是著名的摄影师及屡获殊荣的电影制作人。他入选《户外》杂志“30位30岁以下户外领域推动者”。
director_info_eng: Joey Schusler is a professional adventure athlete,photographer, and award winning filmmaker. Named one of Outside Magazines “30 under 30” of young people making big strides in the outdoor industry.
info_chn: 美国 | 2018 | 19分钟 | 英语/尼泊尔语 | 山地自行车
description_chn: 加德满都混乱的大街小巷看起来并不像是世界级山地自行车运动员的培养皿，但拉杰什·马加（RJ）是个特例。无论是脏乱垃圾场还是喜马拉雅山脉崎岖的山路，都是RJ的训练场。他的凭着自己的坚韧和决心，实现了他自童年时期发芽的伟大梦想。
description_eng: The chaotic streets of Kathmandu may not seem like a typical breeding ground for world-class mountain bikers, but then again nothing is typical about Rajesh (RJ Magar. Being forged from junkyard scraps and tested on the rugged trails of the mighty Himalaya, RJ’s story is one of boundless childhood dreaming and unstoppable determination.

director_info_chn: 雅各布·施维菲佛是一位探险摄影师、电影制作人以及Whiteroom Productions联合创始人。年少时接触攀登和滑雪，并成为专业山地向导。他前往世界各地鲜为人知的地方，用相机纪录冒险、攀登、滑雪以及探险者的故事。
director_info_eng: Jakob Schweighofer is an adventure photographer, filmmaker and co-owner of Whiteroom Productions. He loves climbing and skiing when he was 15 and later became a professional mountain guide. He travelled to some of the world’s most remote areas to document expeditions, climb, ski and connect with people.
info_chn: 奥地利 | 2017 | 16分钟 | 英语 | 攀冰
description_chn: 年轻登山家米奇·沃勒本对登山运动拥有着难以抑制的热忱和野心，千百次的攀登冒险使他生命饱满，不断的挑战使他感受到存在的意义。他不停新纪录，取得斐然成就，但他的身体无法支撑他继续。他的生活发生了翻天覆地的变化，能否继续攀岩似乎都有问题。恐慌和空虚向他袭来，他将如何面对？
description_eng: The young alpinist Michi Wohlleben is hard to control his ambition and enthusiasm for climbing.  Thousands of climbing and adventures filled his life and helps him to find himself. He keeps accomplishing outstanding records. Suddenly, his body revealed his limits after a banal training session. From that moment, his life turns upside down. It seems hard he will be able to climb again. Panic and emptiness attacked him. How will he face it？

director_info_chn: 本·佩奇是一位屡获殊荣的英国电影制作人、户外探险家和摄影师。他的作品入围众多国际电影节并斩获多项大奖，例如加拿大班夫山地电影节评委特别推荐、纽约电影节最佳探险影片等。
director_info_eng: Ben Page is a multi-award winning filmmaker, adventurer and photographer based in the UK. His highly acclaimed films have appeared in more than 30 international film festivals winning numerous awards such as Banff and New York Film Festival.
info_chn: 英国 | 2017 | 24分钟 | 英语 | 自行车
description_chn: 这部短片记录了本·佩奇完成独自骑行穿越美洲大陆、进入加拿大北极的冬季旅程。在旅程中，他逐渐意识到在恶劣的环境中旅行的残酷——这与他对这片土地的浪漫幻想相去甚远。影片把他的喜怒哀乐以及独自旅行的心路历程真实裸露地展现在大家面前。
description_eng: This short film charts director’s winter journey into the Canadian Arctic as he completed his bike ride up the American continent. Yet, as he came to realize, the harsh truths of travelling in such a formidable environment were a long way from the romantic images he’d held of this land. It is an honest reflection on his solo trip; of the wonder, terror and frustration he experienced when riding through the unforgiving emptiness of 'last great wildernesses'.

title_eng: White Wolves – Ghosts Of The Arctic
director_info_chn: 奥利弗·戈茨尔是一位生物学者，同时也是一位电影制作人。他与BBC、探索频道、国家地理等知名机构合作，主要从事自然环保、野生动物影像制作。他的代表作《白狼：北极之灵》入围70余个国际影展，并斩获多项国际大奖。
director_info_eng: Oliver Goetzl is a biologist and a filmmaker. He works with BBC, Discovery Channel, National Geographic and other well-known organizations, mainly engaged in environmental and wildlife films production. His representative work, WHITE WOLVES – GHOSTS OF THE ARCTIC has been screened as a selected finalist at 70 international film festivals. It received 120 accolades so far.
production: GULO FILM PRODUCTION for NDR Naturfilm/Doclights/NDR/WDR/ARTE/TERRA MATER/CBC/WNET/PBS/NHK/SVT
info_chn: 德国/加拿大/美国/奥地利/日本/法国/瑞典 | 2018 | 56分钟 | 英语 | 自然环保
description_chn: 暖春将至，作为北极圈的猎手——白狼也不得不开始为了物种的延续而繁衍后代。本片将带领我们窥探一个白狼家庭的生活，展示了这个在地球最后一片荒野中努力生存的家庭的奋斗和成就，感受它们的忠诚、陪伴守候和奉献精神。
description_eng: As the spring melt approaches, white wolves, the roaming hunters must adapt to being tethered parents as new additions to the pack have just been born. With never-before-seen footage of wolf family life, (Ghosts of the Arctic is a dramatic and touching story of loyalty, companionship and devotion. It’s an epic true tale that reveals the struggles and triumphs of a family working to survive in one of the last great wildernesses on Earth.
